text:
Osano is hiring a HubSpot revops leader - join us! This is a super fun and really important remote job for the right person.

Get in on the forefront of data privacy, do something great for the world while building a fulfilling career with wonderful people by joining the Osano rocketship!!!! :rocket::rocket::rocket: <https://careers.osano.com/jobs/6Bcf1D-HFMBH>
